languages.english-overview:
Raphaël is a small JavaScript library that should simplify your work with vector graphics on the web. If you want to create your own specific chart or image crop and rotate widget, for example, you can achieve it simply and easily with this library.
Raphaël is licensed under the MIT License.
languages.english-features:
Compact
Modular
Object-Oriented JavaScript framework
Cross-browser code
Coherent API
Browser Compatibility
Raphaël currently supports Firefox 3.0+, Safari 3.0+, Opera 9.5+ and Internet Explorer 6.0+.
